Html:
Hi,

 I need to get Response XML using soap fetch function instead of retrieved object

using XRMservicetoolkit. Please advise how to do it.

 

Thanks,

Harkamal Singh

harkamalgrewal wrote:

Hi,

 I need to get Response XML using soap fetch function instead of retrieved object

using XRMservicetoolkit. Please advise how to do it.

 

Thanks,

Harkamal Singh


Hey There.

I am afraid that the library does not support the response XML as a whole as there is a specific logic to deseralize the result into a buesiness enity.

If you will need to get the response XML, i would recommend either write the logic yourself (examples could be found in SDK or forums). You can also extend the library to suit your needs.

Happy Coding,

Jaimie
